thread.title: iTunes Offering Free Downloads of AHS: Hotel, Fargo and More
thread.title_full: iTunes Offering Free Downloads of AHS: Hotel, Fargo and More

author: TV Guide
title: iTunes Offering Free Downloads of AHS: Hotel, Fargo and More
text: Posted Oct. 3, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 2:20 PM Posted Oct. 3, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 2:20 PM Â» Social News iTunes is offering free downloads of several new and returning shows this fall. The day after select shows premiere, iTunes users will be able download the first episode. That means even if you don't have cable, there's no excuse for missing out on Lady Gaga 's American Horror Story debut. The service is also making several movies, including Jurassic World , Trainwreck , Inside Out and The Hobbit: The Battle of Five Armies , available for free. Click here for the full list , and check out all the free TV premieres iTunes is offering below.
